add_feature_collection_layer_from_table.description: Create a Feature Collection Layer from a Feature Collection Table, and add it to a map.
add_feature_collection_layer_from_table.title: Add feature collection layer from table

add_feature_layers.description: Display feature layers from various data sources.
add_feature_layers.title: Add feature layers

add_tiled_layer.description: Load an ArcGIS tiled layer from a URL.
add_tiled_layer.title: Add tiled layer

add_tiled_layer_as_basemap.description: Load an offline copy of a tiled map service as a basemap.
add_tiled_layer_as_basemap.title: Add tiled layer as basemap

add_vector_tiled_layer.description: Load an ArcGIS Vector Tiled Layer from a URL.
add_vector_tiled_layer.title: Add vector tiled layer

apply_class_breaks_renderer_to_sublayer.description: Apply a renderer to a sublayer.
apply_class_breaks_renderer_to_sublayer.title: Apply class breaks renderer to sublayer

apply_scheduled_updates_to_preplanned_ma.description: Apply scheduled updates to a downloaded preplanned map area.
apply_scheduled_updates_to_preplanned_ma.title: Apply scheduled updates to preplanned map area

apply_simple_renderer_to_feature_layer.description: Change the appearance of a feature layer with a renderer.
apply_simple_renderer_to_feature_layer.title: Apply simple renderer to feature layer

apply_unique_value_renderer.description: Render features in a layer using a distinct symbol for each unique attribute value.
apply_unique_value_renderer.title: Apply unique value renderer

authenticate_with_oauth.description: Authenticate with ArcGIS Online (or your own portal) using OAuth2 to access secured resources (such as private web maps or layers).
authenticate_with_oauth.title: Authenticate with OAuth

display_clusters.description: Display a web map with a point feature layer that has feature reduction enabled to aggregate points into clusters.
display_clusters.title: Display clusters

display_map.description: Display a map with an imagery basemap.
display_map.title: Display map

display_map_from_mobile_map_package.description: Display a map from a mobile map package.
display_map_from_mobile_map_package.title: Display map from mobile map package

download_preplanned_map_area.description: Take a map offline using a preplanned map area.
download_preplanned_map_area.title: Download preplanned map area

filter_by_definition_expression_or_displ.description: Filter features displayed on a map using a definition expression or a display filter.
filter_by_definition_expression_or_displ.title: Filter by definition expression or display filter

find_address_with_reverse_geocode.description: Use an online service to find the address for a tapped point.
find_address_with_reverse_geocode.title: Find address with reverse geocode

find_closest_facility_from_point.description: Find routes from several locations to the respective closest facility.
find_closest_facility_from_point.title: Find closest facility from point

find_route.description: Display directions for a route between two points.
find_route.title: Find route

identify_layer_features.description: Identify features in all layers in a map.
identify_layer_features.title: Identify layer features

query_feature_table.description: Find features in a feature table which match an SQL query.
query_feature_table.title: Query feature table

query_table_statistics.description: Query a table to get aggregated statistics back for a specific field.
query_table_statistics.title: Query table statistics

search_with_geocode.description: Find the location for an address or places of interest near a location or within a specific area.
search_with_geocode.title: Search with geocode

select_features_in_feature_layer.description: Select features in a feature layer.
select_features_in_feature_layer.title: Select features in feature layer

set_basemap.description: Set a map's basemap. A basemap is beneath all layers on a map and is used to provide visual reference for the operational layers.
set_basemap.title: Set Basemap

show_device_location.description: Display your current position on the map, as well as switch between different types of auto pan modes.
show_device_location.title: Show device location

show_device_location_history.description: Display your device's location history on the map.
show_device_location_history.title: Show device location history

show_magnifier.description: Tap and hold on a map to show a magnifier.
show_magnifier.title: Show magnifier

show_service_area.description: Find the service area within a network from a given point.
show_service_area.title: Show service area

style_point_with_simple_marker_symbol.description: Show a simple marker symbol on a map.
style_point_with_simple_marker_symbol.title: Style point with simple marker symbol
